issue.title: Old sdformat-sdf debs are not archived

content.raw:
We archive all our artifact in the S3 container. You can find the [sdformat-sdf](http://gazebosim.org/distributions/sdformat/releases/) old versions starting from `2.0.1`.

The main point of our package design is that `sdformat-sdf` package should be compatible among all versions, so having a `4.1.0` of `sdformat-sdf` "should" work with old sdformat versions.
content.html:
We archive all our artifact in the S3 container. You can find the sdformat-sdf old versions starting from 2.0.1.

The main point of our package design is that sdformat-sdf package should be compatible among all versions, so having a 4.1.0 of sdformat-sdf "should" work with old sdformat versions.
